name: perspectively
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that makes objects appear smaller when they are further away and that makes parallel lines appear to meet each other at a point in the distance: The image on the screen was perspectively corrected. From the top of the hill I was able to look across the valley and see the whole area perspectively.
More examplesFewer examplesHer hand swelled up as if it were perspectively enlarged.In the photograph, the surface of the moon was perspectively foreshortened.The horse dominated the foreground of the image, while the building in the background was perspectively diminished.
